usercssData.name: Default Dark (TOPdesk Operator Recoloring)
usercssData.description: Override the colors of the TOPdesk operator section, for accessibility purposes.

background-filter.label: Background filter
background-filter.name: background-filter
background-filter.default: brightness(0) saturate(100%) invert(0%) sepia(11%) saturate(1945%) hue-rotate(61deg) brightness(105%) contrast(71%)

on-background-filter.label: On background filter
on-background-filter.name: on-background-filter
on-background-filter.default: brightness(0) saturate(100%) invert(100%) sepia(0%) saturate(7500%) hue-rotate(178deg) brightness(129%) contrast(78%)

surface-filter.label: Surface filter
surface-filter.name: surface-filter
surface-filter.default: brightness(0) saturate(100%) invert(19%) sepia(0%) saturate(1%) hue-rotate(180deg) brightness(102%) contrast(82%)

on-surface-filter.label: On surface filter
on-surface-filter.name: on-surface-filter
on-surface-filter.default: brightness(0) saturate(100%) invert(100%) sepia(0%) saturate(7500%) hue-rotate(178deg) brightness(129%) contrast(78%)

disabled-filter.label: Disabled filter
disabled-filter.name: disabled-filter
disabled-filter.default: brightness(0) saturate(100%) invert(19%) sepia(0%) saturate(1%) hue-rotate(180deg) brightness(102%) contrast(62%)

on-disabled-filter.label: On disabled filter
on-disabled-filter.name: on-disabled-filter
on-disabled-filter.default: brightness(0) saturate(100%) invert(62%) sepia(0%) saturate(407%) hue-rotate(172deg) brightness(89%) contrast(69%)

primary-filter.label: Primary filter
primary-filter.name: primary-filter
primary-filter.default: brightness(0) saturate(100%) invert(52%) sepia(29%) saturate(2819%) hue-rotate(211deg) brightness(101%) contrast(92%)

primary-muted-filter.label: Primary muted filter
primary-muted-filter.name: primary-muted-filter
primary-muted-filter.default: brightness(0) saturate(100%) invert(66%) sepia(52%) saturate(3051%) hue-rotate(7deg) brightness(95%) contrast(69%)

on-primary-filter.label: On primary filter
on-primary-filter.name: on-primary-filter
on-primary-filter.default: brightness(0) saturate(100%) invert(0%) sepia(11%) saturate(1945%) hue-rotate(61deg) brightness(105%) contrast(71%)

error-filter.label: Error filter
error-filter.name: error-filter
error-filter.default: invert(59%) sepia(54%) saturate(783%) hue-rotate(309deg) brightness(99%) contrast(80%)

on-error-filter.label: On error filter
on-error-filter.name: on-error-filter
on-error-filter.default: brightness(0) saturate(100%) invert(0%) sepia(11%) saturate(1945%) hue-rotate(61deg) brightness(105%) contrast(71%)

description: Override the colors of the TOPdesk operator section, for accessibility purposes.
name: Default Dark (TOPdesk Operator Recoloring)
